document_data.mainbody:
Demir was a commoner that lived in the Western Heartlands of Faer√ªn during the late 15 century DR.
He was the most level-headed and cautious person among himself and his siblings.
Demir had a brother named Johl and a sister called Mayrina.
Demirs family was struck with tragedy in the , when Mayrinas husband Connor died rather suddenly. Bearing Connors unborn child and devastated after her loss, Mayrina left for the Sunlit Wetlands to make a bargain with the old hag that lived in a shack within.
Demir and Johl went after their missing sister and managed to confront the old woman of the swamp Ethel, before she made it back to Mayrina who was waiting within her home.
